body.name: TaoTronics TT-AP007 Air Purifier for Home, H13 True HEPA Filter Bedroom Air Cleaner with Air Quality Monitor, Auto Purification Mode, Filter Pet Dander Dust Pollen Mold Spore
features: Auto Monitor & Purify: Breathe fresh air and know its quality from the LED display with auto mode; the air quality sensor detects the ambient air quality and adjusts the fan speed accordingly, auto-adapting to the changing air in your home

3-Stage True HEPA Filtration: Filters out at least 99.97% of airborne pollutants, like pet dander, dust, pollen, mold spores, and strong scents, through the 3-layer filter composed of a pre-filter outer layer, an active carbon filter inner layer, and an H13 HEPA filter in between

Optimal Room Coverage: Keep fresh air flowing by cycling clean air into a 280 sq. ft. room 5 times/h, and 3 times/h for a 466 sq. ft. room; with a clean air delivery rate (CADR) at 260 m³/h, it’s perfect for a living room, bedroom, and office
Variable Speed & Timer Options: Adjust the 3-speed fan and set a countdown timer from 1 to 8 hours to conveniently create the perfect climate to breathe easy and comfortably

Air Care at Night: Have your best night’s sleep and avert an itchy nose when you activate sleep mode; the air purifier will run at just 26dB and the LED display will turn off leaving one dimmed indicator on for locating in the dark
body.description: Technical Specifications:Voltage: US / CA: 120V-60HzRated Power: 55WRated CADR: 260 m³/hFilter: H13 HEPA Filter + Active Carbon Filter + Pre-Filter3 Fan SpeedsRoom Size: 26 m² / 280 ft²Running Noise: 26dB-59 dBWhat’s in the Box:1 x TaoTronics Air Purifier (TT-AP007)1x 3-in-1 True HEPA Filter1 x User GuideNote: Replacement filter for TT-AP007 is sold separately (Search “TT-AP007” to find more)Warranty: TaoTronics air purifier comes with a 12-month warranty. If there’s any questions, please let us know and we’ll get back to you in 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: TT-AP007 Genuine Replacement Filters 2 PACK TT-AP007 Genuine Replacement Filters 3 PACK TT-AP007 Genuine Replacement Filters 4 PACK TT-AP007 Genuine Replacement Filters

TaoTronics - Enhance Your Life Enjoy life to the fullest with TaoTronics. From industry-leading LED lighting solutions to home goods and audio devices, we put users at the center of our decisions and design products that address life’s needs and help you make the most of your daily activities. Air Purification Made Easy TaoTronics Air Purifier feedbacks on the ever-changing indoor air quality with built-in air quality monitor, while the machine reacts and adjusts the fan speed to keep the air in the best condition. 3-speed auto adjustment Real-time air quality reading True HEPA H13 filter Eliminate 99.97% of airborne pollutants Display off CADR 260 m³/hin sleep mode 1-8hr auto shutdown timer

Filter Change Reminder The air purifier displays "End" to remind you it's time to replace the filter. We also recommend checking the filter regularly and replacing it according to your local air quality. Search "TT-AP007" to get a TaoTronics replacement filter. Pick up With One Hand An embedded handle on the back of the air purifier makes it easy to pick up and effortlessly move around your home. Fit In 4 Easy Steps 1. Open the front cover from the bottom and remove it. 2. Replace the old filter with a new one. 3. Put the front cover back. 4. Reset the filter change reminder. (1)Change the filter when "End" reminder shows: press "Timer" & "AUTO" buttons for 3s. (2)Change the filter ahead of the reminder: press the "Timer" button for 3s until there is a beep sound.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, modern designed air purifier and works efficiently!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I already have one air purifier in my home but wanted another one for our baby room to keep it dirt free and with better air quality. Decided to go with any brand that is known to me and ended up with this after comparing multiple features and I am loving it for the below reasons. This one definitely does a better job of purifying air faster than the other one that I have at home.Have been using this product for 1+ week and below are my 2 cents :Pros:- It does the job of air purifier very well. It changes from red to blue to green pretty fast. While cooking it shows cranked up AQI number and cleans fast. Smell normalizes in the room pretty fast. 3-Stage True HEPA Filtration- Different level of fan control : 3 levels + Auto. You won't hear anything when on speed 1. Very silent- Misses night/sleep mode but at fan speed 1, it is definitely with very low noise but not as low as night/sleep mode does on other purifiers- Real-time air quality index with color-coding- Has front display instead of being on the top, so easy to see the AQI's from far as well- Timer functionality of 1 to 8 hours settings is a nice to have feature too- Sleek and modern design giving a great aesthetic to the room- Reasonably priced for the functionality and efficiently- 12 months warranty with 18 more months extension after registering the product. This gives a long term peace of mind and also shows that the manufacturer is confident in his productCons:- Missed night/sleep mode- There is no smart WIFI connection feature and so can't be controlled remotely. I wish it had one for this price as I do have it with my other air purifier at home. It is so convenient to control it via app or voice control- Filter replacement is a little costly but it's the same for all brandsRecommended if you want to be within a $200 budget and with good air-purifying capability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleaner air less allergies happy life
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. So glad I have buy this Taotronics air purifier I have other purifiers for my house. They have been so important to us, now more than never with everything happening. We love this air purifier! Super helpful with allergies and odors.Air purifiers are designed to filter the air in a single room, not the entire house, like an HVAC system this one gives fresh air flowing by cycling clean air into a 280 sq. ft. room 5 times/h or 3 times/h for a 466 sq. ft. room; with a clean air delivery rate (CADR) at 260 m³/h, it’s perfect for a living room, bedroom, and office, I use this one in between my kitchen and dining room it has truly helped the air quality and air flow in my home.Has 3 adjustable speed fan and a timer from 1 to 8 hours, also has sleep mode; will run at just 26dB and the LED display will turn off leaving one dimmed indicator on for locating in the dark.3-Stage True HEPA Filtration which clean the air at least 99.97% of airborne pollutants, like pet dander, dust, pollen, mold spores, and strong scents, through the 3-layer filter composed of a pre-filter outer layer, an active carbon filter inner layer, and an H13 HEPA filter in between.Overall Stylish product, well designed. Easy to use and very quiet, you can immediately felt the difference in air quality. Couldn’t be more pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Proct for the price
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for an 18'x14' master BR with Bath. Definite difference in air quality. I also use it for white noise on the highest setting. Quiet enough on low setting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Day 2 Seem legit and good quality!
reviews.reviewText: Had it for a day. Took a chance and bought 4 of them for the bedrooms.Very quiet even on fan speed 3.Sleek modern design and because the intake air vents are on the side, the unit can hug a wall... Have mine four inches out. I've been running the units on high now for a day and it shows blue consistently now. Blue is rhe best, green is moderate and red is not so good.First day the blue would turn to green and sometimes red. Today it is consistently blue. Progress!My intent is to place each unit on auto and have them run all the time, ramp up when the sensor detects poor air quality or orders. Auto mode and level 1 fan are probably about the same and can't hear anything really. Sleep mode could have used an actual button. You have to cycle through the fan settings 1 through 3 and after 3 is sleep mode where the fan works silently and the front display is off except for a dim white light that let's you know the unit is on and probably so you don't trip over it in the middle of the night.So to get to night mode, press the fan button four times. Beep beep beep beep... Yeah a dedicated sleep button is in order.Other than the lights going off for sleep mode, the fan speed is about the same as auto or level 1. Now the dilema begins... I like the white noise at night so level 3 is great and it is soothing, however the led display is pretty bright in a dark room.I'm okay with it but don't think my wife will be. Also, sleep mode is not pushing out a lot of air. I like the idea of max cleaning while sleeping, but will have the bright lights. To make this unit perfect, dedicated sleep button and a dedicated display on/off so people can run any speed of fan and turn off the led lights.The units are great for bedrooms, or a small living room etc. We are getting a larger unit different manufacturer, to handle the downstairs and upstairs open air design. Between having the bedroom units and the larger capacity unit in the shared living spaces, I think we will be breathing very good air! A must for allergy and asthma! I do notice the difference in air quality when going into the bedrooms now. And did sleep much better last night.Yay! Air purifiers rock!I looked at a lot of air pruifirers before deciding upon this one. So far so good!Filters are thick and you can see the actual granulated carbon pieces in the honeycomb filter back side. Very good!Next is trying auto mode 24x7 to see if the air quality maintains!
